property.name: Traits
property.value: Decree,House Arryn,

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your House card. Neutral House Arryn cards you own gain the Stark affiliation while they are in play or in your hand. Marshalling: Kneel your House card to reduce the cost of the next House Arryn character you play this phase by 1. That character claims 1 power when it enters play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +4 STR and cannot be declared as an attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Return Alayne Stone to her owner's hand any time you control Sansa Stark. Response: after Alayne Stone is killed, claim up to 4 power for your House (to a maximum of 6 total power on your House).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you play Northern Minstrel from your hand, each player may search his or her deck for a card and put it into his or her hand. Then, shuffle their decks.

property.value: Attach to your House card. Neutral Clansman cards you own gain the Lannister affiliation while they are in play or in your hand. property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains the Clansman trait. Response: after an opponent triggers an effect, attached character gains a power icon until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Crawn Son of Calor has power on him, opponents' characters get +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 6 or fewer power on your House, Clansman characters you control gain stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 6 or fewer power on your House card, kill all participating non-Clansman characters when the first challenge resolves each phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a challenge in which Tyrion Lannister participated, draw a card for each participating Clansman character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tribes of the Vale gets -4 STR while any player has 6 or more power on his or her House card.

property.value: Challenges: Kneel Hallowed Ground to choose a character. Until the end of the phase that character gets a power icon. If it already has a printed power icon, it instead gets renown.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the challenge phase, put into play all characters with a power icon in all dead piles that were killed that phase. If any characters are returned to play in this manner, discard Wandering Holy Man from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghost of High Heart cannot be discarded from play. While Ghost of High Heart is standing, Brotherhood characters get +1 STR. Challenges: Kneel Ghost of High Heart to look at a player's hand, and discard a card of your choice from that hand. That player draws a card.

property.value: Lord,Ally,House Arryn

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Littlefinger from your hand, choose an opponent. Until the end of the phase, that opponent must play with his or her hand revealed. For your next marshalling action, you may play any card from that hand as if you are playing it from your own hand. Ignore any out of House gold penalties for that card.

property.value: House Arryn,Ally,

property.value: Challenges: During a military challenge, kneel Mord to choose an attacking or defending character with printed STR 3 or lower. That character does not count its STR for the duration of the challenge.

property.value: Lord,House Arryn,

property.name: Text
property.value: While Nestor Royce is defending, characters must have either the Lord or Lady trait or the Noble crest to count their STR.

property.value: Lord,House Arryn,

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Robert Arryn from your hand, you may search your deck for a Decree attachment, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Any Phase: Discard a House Arryn character from play (cannot be saved) to stand Robert Arryn.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: For the purposes of the draw cap, any effect that would move a card from a player's deck to his or her hand is considered a draw effect.

property.value: Granary Overseer adds 1 to your income for each location you control with at least 1 card attached.

property.value: If High Road Patrol is killed, attach it to a House Arryn location you control instead of putting it in your dead pile, if able. (Counts as a Boon attachment with the text 'Marshalling: Kneel 2 influence to unattach High Road Patrol and leave it in play as a character.')

property.value: If Vale Lordling is killed, attach it to a House Arryn location you control instead of putting it in your dead pile, if able. (Counts as a Boon attachment with the text 'Marshalling: Kneel 1 influence to unattach Vale Lordling and leave it in play as a character.')

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,Stronghold,

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to triggered effects. You may start the game with The Eyrie and any number of its duplicates in play before drawing your Setup hand. You cannot place cards during Setup. [+3 GOLD] [+2 INFLUENCE ]

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,Stronghold,

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a power challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose and kneel a non-Army character. If you control The Eyrie or Littlefinger, instead kill that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Westeros,House Arryn,

property.name: Text
property.value: During power challenges, raise the claim value on each player's revealed plot card by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Kneel Forgotten Dungeon to choose a non-unique character. While Forgotten Dungeon remains knelt, treat that character as though its text box were blank

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel The Flint Cliffs to lower the cost of the next War character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel The Riverroad to lower the cost of the next Noble character you play this phase by 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel The Sea of Dorne to lower the cost of the next Learned character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you draw a card, kneel Vale Granary to attach that card facedown to Vale Granary. Marshalling: Kneel Vale Granary to put one of its attached facedown cards into its owner's hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Waycastle to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR (+4 STR instead if any opponent has 6 or more power on his House).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose 2 characters with non-matching House affiliations in two different discard piles. Put each of those characters into play under its owner's control. If either character is still in play at the end of the phase, discard it from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you have 6 or fewer power on your House card. Challenges: Choose an opponent. That opponent cannot initiate challenges of the type of your choice this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: Kneel a Learned character to name a plot card. No player can choose to reveal that plot card this phase unless they have no other playable option

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister or House Martell only. Challenges: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a Noble character to choose 2 standing characters. They must be declared as attackers or defenders during the next intrigue or power challenge initiated this phase, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: If you control a Learned character, name a card. Each player then reveals his or her hand. Each player with the named card in hand must choose and discard either all copies of the named card in hand or 3 other cards of his or her choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel a Clansman character to give all non-Clansman characters -1 STR until the end of the phase

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark or House Baratheon only. Any phase: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a Learned character to put into play under your control a House Arryn character in any dead pile that was killed this phase

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy or House Targaryen only. Any phase: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a War character to choose a location or attachment. Until the end of the phase, take control of that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel X influence to search your deck for any number of Clansman characters with combined printed cost X or lower, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you have claimed 2 or more power for your House through a card effect, stand all characters you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a power challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose and kill a non-Dragon character controlled by the losing opponent unless he or she kneels a House Arryn character under his or her control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you are not running an Agenda card. Response: After you are the first player to count income this phase, add 3 to your income.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark or House Lannister only. Dominance: Kneel 1 influence to choose 2 unique characters in 2 different discard piles, and put them into play, under their owners' control

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Either choose and stand a location, or choose and stand any number of locations with at least one card attached

property.name: Text
property.value: Play if you have won a power challenge by 4 or more total STR this phase. Challenges: You may initiate an additional power challenge this phase. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen or House Martell only. Response: Cancel an effect that allows a player to search his or her deck unless he or she kneels 2 influence or a Learned character.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or House Targaryen only. Dominance: Kneel 5 influence or kill a Holy character to put a non-Army character with a power icon from any dead pile into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Until the end of the phase, characters cannot claim power.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control at least one House Arryn character. Dominance: Kneel 6 influence to discard from play all non-House Arryn characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you have claimed 1 or more power for your House through a card effect, choose a character with a power icon. Until the end of the phase, that character does not keel to attack or defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win or lose an unopposed challenge, discard 2 power from your House to choose and discard from play a participating character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Discard 2 power from your House to choose and discard an Ally character from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Discard X power from your House to choose and stand X characters. If any of those characters are currently defending, they get +2 STR until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel 1 influence to search your deck for a Night's Watch character and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opponent has 6 or more power on his or her House card, your House Arryn characters do not kneel to defend

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, any player who controls the most House Arryn characters draws 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat all non-unique locations as if their text boxes were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique characters you control gain renown

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player must choose and kneel a non-Army character he or she controls. Kill all chosen characters except those with the highest chosen STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a player with more cards in hand than every other player would add a card to his or her hand as the result of a card effect, instead discard that card.
